R

Ray - Class in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
A ray is used to find the object that lies in the 3D-space exactly below the 2D point that is pressed by the user on the screen.

Instantiates a new ray.
Ray(Vector3f, Vector3f) - Constructor for class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.Ray
Instantiates a new ray.
RayShapeIntersection - Class in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
This is a data structure to hold information about whether an intersection between a ray and a shape occured and if yes where the hit point is.
RayShapeIntersection() - Constructor for class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.RayShapeIntersection
Instantiates a new ray shape intersection.
RayShapeIntersection(boolean, Vector3f, Node) - Constructor for class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.RayShapeIntersection
Instantiates a new ray shape intersection.
